mapper.select: SELECT sub_categoryno, rownum as rank from (SELECT sub_categoryno, count(*) FROM pay_list WHERE memberno=#{memberno} GROUP BY sub_categoryno ORDER BY count(*) DESC ) WHERE rownum <= 3
select sub_categoryno, rownum as rank from( select sub_categoryno from pay_list where memberno=#{memberno} AND sub_categoryno in(#{sub_no1},#{sub_no2},#{sub_no3}) order by rdate DESC) where rownum<=5
